turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi! How are you doing?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! And you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Super! About 25 minutes outside of Key West. Long drive, very tired, just need to get something to eat and get to the hotel.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can I order something for you to pick up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please! Can you find a Papa John's nearby the hotel you booked?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure...perfect, one two blocks away.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What can I order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just one pizza...going to eat and sleep for two days hahaha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You want large? Toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I hear they have have a few new specialty pizzas, what flavors?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Meatball Pepperoni, Super Hawaiian, Ultimate Pepperoni, Zesty Italian Trio, Fiery Buffalo Chicken and Philly Cheesecake. Yummy!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's try the Fiery Buffalo, large. Malcolm says not too hot, though, please get one with a milder sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Checking...oh sorry, no choice on the heat level of the sauce.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm, Malcolm, what do you want to do?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have a large BBQ chicken and bacon, how about that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Malcolm says great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, that's a large BBQ chicken and bacon pizza, regular crust, $18.00 ready in 25 minutes. Address 2504 North Roosevelt Blvd, two blocks south of your hotel.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wonderful! Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome! Receipt being texted to your cell.

items.name: 2504 North Roosevelt Blvd, two blocks south of your hotel
